name: Eternal Warfare-Idle Games
description:
Fight your battles in this Card Simulator Game about magic legends. In this world of magic, courageous warriors are about to assemble and fight against conspiratorial monsters. Endless adventure, dungeon challenges, diversified gameplay and great rewards create a legendary journey which is awaiting an extraordinary explorer.
Come to participate in war and conquer the battlefield!

Game Features

DIVERSIFIED GAMEPLAY
This is an incremental, card, simulator, competition, collection and turn-based game. Upgrade and enhance your heroes to cast amazing spells on your enemies and help your allies to revive when they bump into serious trouble.

COMPETITIONS
Compete with your friends around the world and win the top glory! Abundant diamonds, which are of great importance in this world, will be hidden in Random Match Arena. New stars of champion will rise in Championship Arena, in which there’re bunches of opportunities for you to defeat opponents.

TEAMMATES CULTIVATION
6 races inhabits in this world: Holy, Shadow, Element, Undead, Demon and Nature. Heroes will help you annihilate tens of thousands of enemies. Assemble your warriors, form an unbreakable coalition and start the adventure!

AFK AND UPGRADE
We are devoted to liberate your hands and heroes will be upgraded automatically. Your heroes are always fighting for you even when you’re away from mobile phone and trying to make every second in adventure count. Your pace in this world will never ever stop or restricted by other factors.

-Play the game with your friends for free! All you need is an Internet connection. Invite other players to join your guild. Chat, share your strats, and battle other players in one mobile game.
